My technical expertise includes **Concurrency**, **Goroutines**, and **Channels**, ensuring efficient processing and responsiveness in application design. My background extends into software development with **Java**, **Python**, and machine learning processes, enhancing enterprise-grade platforms with seamless integration of AI/ML capabilities.
